author: Harry Craddock
description: Originally shaken but perhaps better stirred. Simple but no less tasty for it.
name: Marny Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: Originally shaken but perhaps better stirred. Simple but no less tasty for it.
video.name: HOWTO make Marny Cocktail
